hero.title: Discover Cozy Living
hero.subtitle: With Reasonable Rent
hero.description: Modern, cozy condos in safe neighborhoods.

intro.title: Where Comfort Meets Convenience
intro.description: Discover the perfect blend of comfort and convenience in our thoughtfully designed smart cozy condo units. Ideal for singles, couples, or working professionals seeking a living solution that feels like home the moment you walk in.

community.title: Community
community.modernDesc: Smart use of space with modern layouts
community.convenientDesc: Close to shops, cafes, and public transport

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Ready to find your new home? Have questions about our properties? We'd love to hear from you.

about.title: Ellavillages
about.description: Whether you're looking for a peaceful space to unwind or a stylish spot to call home, our condo units offer everything you need in a compact, charming setting.

card1.title: A Touch of Modern Happiness
card1.description: Look ahead to the festive seasons at Ella destinations, a three-course preparation for joy-filled celebrations.

card2.title: Professional Living Programme
card2.description: Offered exclusively at seven Ella destinations, embark on a three-day Personalization Programme by Royal Deluxe.

card3.title: Safe & Secure Living
card3.description: In partnership with local security, enjoy a secure haven designed for worry-free living.

contactForm.title: Send us a Message
contactForm.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about what you're looking for, preferred move-in date, or any questions you have...
